summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2638, for the improvement of East Howell Street from 34th Avenue to 37th Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same to a width of 18 feet with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation and by providing the necessary water service, sewerage and drainage, under Ordinance No. 30973 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
